Text.Value: If I prove myself to Lady Shar, she'll bless me with power - power we can use to take on the Absolute and rid ourselves of these parasites, once and for all. Let's explore.
Search your memories. Do you know anything of the Dark Justiciars?
We should be able to proceed now - the trials are all complete. Lady Shar's final task is near.
You don't understand - this will help free us from our infection.
Leave.
The Dark Justiciars were the Nightsinger's most trusted warriors - this is where they earned their place.
Recall the contents of the book you found about Dark Justiciars.
You've been keeping secrets from me - is helping you in my best interest?

EditorData.logicalname: JUST LEARNED SH IS SHAR WORSHIPPER

Text.Value: I'm sorry I kept it from you. It's not a secret to be shared lightly.
*Your convictions have proven true. This is the Gauntlet of Lady Shar. Perhaps here, you can show yourself to be worthy. A Dark Justiciar, at last.*
*Lady Shar's values are clear - her children must excel in stealth, combat and navigating her sacred darkness.*
*No doubt they test the unseemly virtues Sharrans hold dear - stealth, violence, skulking in darkness, and other such craven pursuits.*
*Shar worshippers value traits like stealth, martial prowess, and navigating their goddess' darkness. The trials may test such skills.*
*Nothing comes to you.*
If I become a Dark Justiciar, I'll have Lady Shar's highest blessing, and her arsenal at my disposal. This will be good for all of us. Let's explore.
Search your memories. What do you know of the Dark Justiciars?
Hold on - are you telling me you worship Shar, Shadowheart?
I'm glad we can face them together. If we become Dark Justiciars, we'll have Lady Shar's highest blessing, and her arsenal at our disposal. Let's explore.
Thank you. If I become a Dark Justiciar, I'll have Lady Shar's highest blessing, and her arsenal at my disposal. This will be good for all of us. Let's explore.
What does it mean? It means we'll have power - power we can use to take on the Absolute and rid ourselves of these parasites, once and for all.

EditorData.NodeContext: Slightly surprised that the player doesn't recognise this as a Big Deal.

Text.Value: *A shiver of revulsion passes through you. Many enemies of the Moonmaiden must have been indoctrinated in this place.*
Recall what you read before about the Trials of Shar.
Not the place or manner in which I thought you'd learn it, but yes - I worship the Dark Lady.
We have all the gems - let's put them to use and continue onwards.
In order to join Lady Shar's elite, you had to pass her trials, then make a sacrifice in her innermost sanctum - one revealed only when you've proven yourself. Very few made it that far.
*There are recesses on the altar that look intended to house something. Another such receptacle already contains a gemstone.*

EditorData.stateContext: Player is standing before an altar.

Text.Value: The Gauntlet of Shar. This place is legendary - I surrendered most of my memories to help protect Shar's secrets, yet I still remember the stories of the Gauntlet...
Yes. I've had some doubts in the past... but surely that's normal for such a monumentous step.
I've dreamed of this place. This is my destiny - I must complete the trials.

EditorData.NodeContext: Determined. The chance of a lifetime has presented itself.

Text.Value: You know me better than most - but I need to find out if I'm worthy.
*Your suspicions have proven true. This is the Gauntlet of Lady Shar. Perhaps here, you can show yourself to be worthy. A Dark Justiciar, at last.*
*The inscription's challenge remains the same.*
The Dark Lady's finest warriors arose from this place - and now I'm here.
I've no intention of letting you prove your fanaticism to Shar.
Examine the altar.
What does becoming a Dark Justiciar mean?
*The name seems familiar, but nothing comes to you.*
Leave.
The inscription spoke of the trials of Shar. Ask yourself what those could be.
Honouring the Dark Lady is important, yes... but shouldn't we stay focused on finding a cure?
This is a distraction. We need to stay focused on finding a cure.
The trials of Lady Shar. Recall what they are - you must know, surely.
It seems to be Lady Shar's will - but what are these Dark Justiciar trials, Shadowheart?
What are these trials, Shadowheart?
*Lastly, she asks for a sacrifice. To become a Dark Justiciar, one must spill the blood of a Selûnite.*
*The depravities don't end there - the Sharrans then sacrifice a follower of the Moonmaiden in order to complete their initiation.*
*It seems they would complete their initiation with the blood sacrifice of a Selûnite.*
Are you sure this is what you want?
Frankly I'm amazed you didn't work it out for yourself already. I'm not sure if that makes you highly respectful or deeply ignorant.
Don't worry, I won't sacrifice you. I think Lady Shar would want a more impressive offering.
*The Dark Lady's cadre of elite warriors. The most faithful. The most envied. The most ruthless.*
*You recall stories of elite Sharran warriors - ruthless fanatics.*
*You recall them being an inner circle of Shar followers - elite warriors, loyal to their last breath.*
*Your breath catches. The Gauntlet of Lady Shar - where her Dark Justiciars of old proved their mettle, through gruelling trial and sacrifice. Perhaps you can join their ranks.*
The Gauntlet of Shar.This place is legendary - even with half my memories locked away, I still remember the stories...
We can discuss your hurt feelings later. If we want to make progress in this place, we have to do the trials.
*Upon the altar is an inscription.*
Of course - we are Lady Shar's children, both. The trials must be completed.
All right, I'll help if I can.
Do you really need to ask? It's all I've ever wanted.
There's nothing more for us to do here - not until we complete Lady Shar's trials.
*Brave the Gauntlet of your Lady Shar. Surmount her trials, and rise a Dark Justiciar.*
We're here to gain Ketheric Thorm's trust and uncover the Absolute's secrets - nothing more.

Synopsis: The player approaches an altar dedicated to Shar. This altar is a call to action for the player to complete Shar's trials and become a Dark Justiciar.
